content.en: Quantum spin chains: Scientists have used algorithms to investigate various properties of quantum spin chains, which are important in understanding the behavior of magnetic materials. The algorithms used include the Density Matrix Renormalization Group algorithm, Quantum Monte Carlo methods, Stochastic Series Expansion Quantum Monte Carlo algorithm, and Infinite Time Evolving Block Decimation algorithm, among others. These algorithms help researchers study the ground state, physical properties, thermodynamic properties, spin and bond ordering, phase diagrams, and quantum criticality of different spin chains.
content.da: Kvantspinkæder: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at undersøge forskellige egenskaber ved kvantspinkæder, som er vigtige for at forstå opførelsen af magnetiske materialer. De anvendte algoritmer inkluderer Density Matrix Renormalization Group algoritmen, Quantum Monte Carlo metoder, Stochastic Series Expansion Quantum Monte Carlo algoritmen og Infinite Time Evolving Block Decimation algoritmen, blandt andre. Disse algoritmer hjælper forskere med at studere grundtilstanden, fysiske egenskaber, termodynamiske egenskaber, spin- og bindingsorden, fasediagrammer og kvantekritikalitet af forskellige spinkæder.
